page.title: 06Farming in the Bayford Area
page.content: {Danes Farm Arable land Animals Type Acres Type Number wheat 172 cows(beef) 32 barley 74 heifers 10 oats 66 yearlings 11 oil seed rape 44 calfs 31 beans 25 bulls 1 woodland(timber)80 overall grass 89 { {Bayford Hall Farm}is also mainly arable (wheat, oil seed rape and beans) with some woodland (used for shooting). This farm has gradually changed from grass to mainly arable, but they stable 12 horses. As can be seen from the above information,{arable farming}is most common in this area, and both farmers recieve most of their income from crops.
